definitions.definition: carry out, accomplish, or fulfill (an action, task, or function).
examples: I have my duties to perform
synonyms: implement; Moreinformalpull off; formaleffectuate; archaicacquit oneself of "I have my duties to perform"

definitions.definition: work, function, or do something to a specified standard.
examples: the car performs well at low speeds
synonyms: acquit oneself/itself "a car that performs well at low speeds"

definitions.definition: have successful or satisfactory sexual intercourse with someone.
present (a form of entertainment) to an audience.
examples: the cast of 14 perform the play superbly
synonyms: produce "the play has been performed in San Francisco"

definitions.definition: entertain an audience, typically by acting, singing, or dancing on stage.
examples: the band will be performing live in Hyde Park
synonyms: act "the band performed live in Central Park"
